title: Introducing: Ours.
body:
**Ours.**

are a Portland duo comprised of Natalie Aldarondo and Rex Moreno, crafting wonderfully colourful synth-pop. With a handful of tracks on Soundcloud all uploaded within the course of the past month, it’s clearly very early days for **Ours.** yet there’s easily enough to suggest that they have the potential to be a force to be reckoned with. There’s elements of P4k favourites Braids, Hundred Waters and LA duo Kisses amidst their sugary sweet melodies. Check out _Holy War_, _Sink With Me_ and _Fall In Line_ below, as well as more over at their [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/ours-4).
